CustomField.description: Select the applicable for sector grant
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select the applicable for sector grant
CustomField.label: Reason for Grant

value.fullName: Help to overcome barriers to business growth
value.label: Help to overcome barriers to business growth

value.fullName: Increase profitability or productivity, or stimulates domestic or foreign investment
value.label: Increase profitability or productivity, or stimulates domestic or foreign investment

value.fullName: Improves diversity, equity and inclusion, in the sector or in service delivery
value.label: Improves diversity, equity and inclusion, in the sector or in service delivery

value.fullName: Improves availability of, access to or geographic diversity in physical space
value.label: Improves availability of, access to or geographic diversity in physical space

value.fullName: Increase domestic sales or supports engagement with domestic organizations
value.label: Increase domestic sales or supports engagement with domestic organizations

value.fullName: Increase exports, improves international reputation or supports the development of international collaborations
value.label: Increase exports, improves international reputation or supports the development of international collaborations

value.fullName: Promote the sector, within the Toronto Region or externally
value.label: Promote the sector, within the Toronto Region or externally

value.fullName: Strengthens internal network and collaboration within the sector
value.label: Strengthens internal network and collaboration within the sector

value.fullName: Supports innovation within or technology transfer to the sector
value.label: Supports innovation within or technology transfer to the sector
